channel.title: Help with Fiery Metal Torch~~~method58(25106);
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a new background for my client that won't work with the fiery stuff. The problem is, I don't want to add the torches, but if I can move the location of the fire by just a bit...I could keep it and it'll look awesome (a fire on the mountains)! I know to add the fire, you put "method58(25106);" in client.java. How would I change the X & Y coordinates, though?
Thank you,
TheCyberMan

item.title: Help with Fiery Metal Torch~~~method58(25106);
